overview: A story about a man-legend, soldier of fortune, about the "mad" hero of Constantine Masaleva. A born warrior. About the fighter of the most terrible and ruthless division of the first Chechen war known as the"Mad company". This is a film about a deadly drug called war, about life after the war and PTSD. About love for Russia. And the strange, sometimes cruel" love " of Russia for its soldiers.
title: Kostya Pitersky
